title: The PIG Daily #60 | Striking from the Shadows! ICYFAR #13
excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR: "Epic Comebacks" - Submit your games involving an epic comeback! Send submissions to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment. Lastest submission until the second daily of the week (Monday in EU/US, Tuesday in AUS/KR). Full Playlist of Daily VoDs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFUDU8AOevUdOq5x--TBFC-p54CMWM4Fb
